alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 21 at 12:38PM PST until December 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...San Francisco, North Bay Interior Valleys and San Francisco Bay Shoreline. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tidal levels are running just under 1 foot higher than tidal predictions. High tide will peak about 7:24 am PST Friday between 6.7 to 7.0 feet, resulting in minor coastal flooding for low-lying, flood-prone spots adjacent to the San Francisco Bay.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
